simplesect.para: WDG reset time = reset_interval + interrupt interval

parameterdescription.para:
WDG clock source
wdg_clksrc_extclk External clock
wdg_clksrc_pclk Peripheral clock

briefdescription.para: Convert the Reset interval value based on the WDG source clock frequency and the expected reset interval in terms of microseconds.

parameterdescription.para: Expected Reset interval in terms of microseconds

briefdescription.para: Convert the interrupt interval value based on the WDG source clock frequency and the expected interrupt interval in terms of microseconds.
Convert the Reset interval value based on the WDG source clock frequency and the expected reset interval in terms of microseconds.
Convert the interrupt interval value based on the WDG source clock frequency and the expected interrupt interval in terms of microseconds.

parameterdescription.para: Expected Interrupt interval in terms of microseconds

briefdescription.para: Get Actual WDG Interrupt Interval in terms of microseconds.

simplesect.para: Converted WDG interrupt interval in terms of microseconds

briefdescription.para: Get Actual WDG Reset Interval in terms of microseconds.

simplesect.para: Converted WDG total reset interval in terms of microseconds
